sentences.sentence: The committee is made up of two co-ordinators and a number of committee members, plus several hundred " raggies ".
sentences.translation: 该委员会由两名协调员和一些委员会成员，以及数百名“亲密朋友”组成。

sentences.sentence: In both states, the co-ordinators first enlisted the help of local leaders, who were not necessarily elected officials.
sentences.translation: 在上述二州，奥巴马手下的文员们首先获得了当地一些领导人的支持，而这些领导人不需要通过官方的选举产生。
